document.full_text: five nato service members and at least four afghan troops were killed by a suicide bomber in an afghan national security uniform as the taliban warned it would step up its infiltration of local forces.
document.title: blast kills 9 at afghan base, including 5 from nato
lines_and_colors: five nato service members and at least four afghan troops were killed by a suicide bomber in an afghan national security uniform as the taliban warned it would step up its infiltration of local forces.
